name: JUMP (itch) (jumpghost)
description:
Created for Games Made Quick 1.5,  but not submitted due to taking too long. Actually was submitted, I have some kind of UI-blindeness. Send help.

You are trapped in a raycast world, can you jump and find contentment?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Walk and turn.

QE - Strafe.

Space - Interact.

Escape - Quit.
